body_html: During training there are two sources of mean and variable -- statistics over mini-batch, and global statistics computed using geometric averaging. The idea is that while training you use mini-batch statistics to normalize, and just save global statistics for later. During inference you may not have mini-batches, so you global statistics instead. The name is_training is also used for dropout layers which has different behavior depending on whether you are training
